name: Google Mail with Space Theme
description:
ATTENTION, you must in the edit mode your image insert - view on additional Info

The image from screenshot you can find on http://space.desktopnexus.com/wallpaper/346833/

Small Modification for new GMail with a standart Design applied >please not a Grafik-theme< ,
for best resululs of view, Google Mail Theme 'Aubergine'
please forgot my english, this is havy brocken ;)
additional_info:
The Desktop Wallpaper can you find here http://space.desktopnexus.com/wallpaper/346833/
For trouble with the background Image here is a Code with base64 Image http://pastebin.com/zbvnC733 or here http://paste2.org/p/1856847
Cut and Paste in the Edit Box from Stylish :)
The Code ist too long for userstyles.org :(
And a Base64 Encoder can you find here http://www.base64-image.de

2012-jan-16 small color fix for text in mail reader with htm backround :(
